CustomField.formula: and( or( RecordType.Name = "Single-Line Expense", RecordType.Name = "Multi-Line Expense" ), or( Status1__c = "Superseded", Status1__c = "Cancelled", text(Status__c) = "Superseded", text(Status__c) = "Cancelled", and( Status1__c = "Active", Post_Departure_Date__c, not(isblank(Payable_Invoice__c)) ) ), not(isblank( Recognition_Journal__c)) )
CustomField.label: Process EC
